questions.question: Considering the overall design, what is the primary function indicated by the prominent text?
Based on the textual information, what is the active ingredient's percentage?
What is the suggested usage for this product, according to the clearly visible text?
Observing the label, what is the secondary or inactive ingredient listed?
What is the percentage of the inactive ingredient (alcohol) as explicitly shown?
What storage condition is explicitly recommended on the label regarding temperature?
According to the label, where should this product be kept out of reach?
What is the recommended approach if the condition worsens or persists, according to the label?
What is the contact number provided on the label for urgent medical situations?
What is the recommended usage frequency based on the clearly visible directions?
What is the shape of the product label as visually perceived?
What is the primary color used in the label's background or dominant color scheme?
What is the overall texture of the label, as visually apparent in the image?
What type of information is organized in a tabular format on the label?
What is the predominant style of the text on the product label?
